required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Renal Function After Stentgraft Treatment Of Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm
clinical_study.official_title: Renal Function After Stentgraft Treatment Of Abdominal Aneurysm With Supra- Versus Infrarenal Fixation - a Randomized Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: This randomized controlled trial aim to determine the impact on renal function after treatment for infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) with stentgrafts either with active supra- or infrarenal fixation.

detailed_description.textblock: This randomized controlled trial aim to determine the impact on renal function after treatment for infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm with stentgrafts either with active supra- or infrarenal fixation. Individuals are planned to be included throughout Scandinavia. After inclusion in the study, baseline data is collected and computerized randomization between the two stent graft fixation types is performed. Follow-up will be scheduled after 1 month and 1,3 and 5 years. Analyses of blood samples to determine renal function are undertaken together with CT scans to detect stentgraft performance at all follow-up visits alongside assessments of health-related quality of life questionnaires.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Randomized controlled, parallel group, partly blinded clinical study.
study_design_info.masking_description: The type of stentgraft is masked for participants, investigators and outcome assessors as the journal chart and information about implanted device are made not accessible for the above mentioned individuals, and all data will be gathered in an Electronic Case Report Form (eCRF) with stentgraft information masked.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with decreased renal function (composite endpoint together with the endpoint below)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change between baseline renal function and at 3 years.
primary_outcome.description: Decrease of more than 20 percent in estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) after stentgraft treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with new renal infarct
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change in numbers of new renal infarcts between baseline and at 3 years.
primary_outcome.description: Diagnosed new renal infarct on CT scan after treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with decreased renal function and new renal infarct (Analysis of the individual components of the primary composite endpoint at 1, 3 and 5 years).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of individual endpoints (decrease of more than 20 percent in estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) after stentgraft treatment and diagnosed new renal infarct on CT scan after treatment).

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with decreased score in quality of life-questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1 and 3 years postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: Change in life quality questionnaire (Research and development questionnaire 36 (RAND-36)) one and three years after surgery compared with baseline data collected prior to surgery. Score in the scale are between 0 and 100 and decreased score indicate worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with stentgraft thrombosis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: Occurence of stentgraft thrombosis postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with aneurysm related mortality
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: Aneurysm related mortality postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with aneurysm related hospitalizations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: Aneurysm related hospitalizations postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with continuing aneurysm growth
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: Continuing aneurysm growth postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with new diagnosis of cancer
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: New diagnosis of cancer postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants with migration (Safety endpoint composite together with the endpoints below)
other_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
other_outcome.description: Migration (stentgraft migration more than 3mm) postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants with diagnosed endoleak
other_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
other_outcome.description: Re-intervention for endoleak postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants with aortic rupture
other_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
other_outcome.description: Occurence of postoperative aortic rupture postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants with renal artery thrombosis
other_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
other_outcome.description: Postoperative renal artery thrombosis postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants with renal artery stenosis
other_outcome.time_frame: From treatment and 1, 3 and 5 years postoperatively
other_outcome.description: Occurence of postoperative renal artery stenosis postoperatively at 1 month, 1, 3 and 5 years.

arm_group.description: Individuals that are treated with a suprarenal stentgraft for a previously diagnosed AAA.
Individuals that are treated with an infrarenal stentgraft for a previously diagnosed AAA.

intervention.description: Stentgraft treatment for AAA. Comparison between supra vs infrarenal fixation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Willing and able to provide written informed consent
- Meet criteria for non-ruptured infrarenal/iliac aneurysm
- Suitable anatomy for treatment with an approved device (CE-marked) stentgraft according to the manufacturers' instructions for use for AAA.
- Accepted for treatment with endovascular aortic repair (EVAR) by the participating vascular center.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Ongoing or planned dialysis
- AAA treatment requiring stents or stentgrafts in renal and/or visceral arteries
- Inability to independently complete HRQoL questionnaires due to language barriers
- Anatomical preconditions that do not allow both types of fixation to be used interchangeably, i.e. very advanced suprarenal tortuosity (>60 degrees), advanced suprarenal dilatation or infrarenal thrombus >25% of circumference.

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Hybrid and Interventional Surgery, Sahlgrenska University Hospital
